gradecomputor

Class computorMarkerRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jfree.chart.renderer.AbstractRenderer
      • org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.AbstractCategoryItemRenderer
        • gradecomputor.computorMarkerRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jfree.chart.LegendItemSource, org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.CategoryItemRenderer, org.jfree.chart.util.PublicCloneable

    public class computorMarkerRenderer
extends org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.AbstractCategoryItemRenderer
implements java.lang.Cloneable, org.jfree.chart.util.PublicCloneable, java.io.Serializable
    A custom renderer for generating dynamical Markers in the plot with high sensitivity to the user interaction. This is achieved by associating the ChartEntity with the Marker and linking the mouse listener with the CategoryPlot.
    The default Java routine Shape.getBounds2D() is implemented to generate high precision bounding box of the Marker and avoid "collisions" with other Markers with different value or grade.
    After performing several tests, the Marker width is set to 6.0f (computorMainWindow.computorMainWindow(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)) .

    More labels representing the relevant information are added

    • a label representing the current value of the Marker on the plot.
    • a label representing the percent increase in the scores categorised by the Marker.

    Since:
    0.10
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    quarkCowboy
    See Also:
    CategoryItemEntity, Serialized Form

      • drawItem

        public void drawItem(java.awt.Graphics2D gd,
                     org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.CategoryItemRendererState cirs,
                     java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D rd,
                     org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot cp,
                     org.jfree.chart.axis.CategoryAxis ca,
                     org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis va,
                     org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset cd,
                     int i,
                     int i1,
                     int i2)
        Method to render the dynamical Marker with appropriate settings. No need to trim the rectangle area or anything. This method gets called by the CategoryPlot (CategoryPlot.render(java.awt.Graphics2D, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D, int, org.jfree.chart.plot.PlotRenderingInfo, org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryCrosshairState)) with all the adjustments already done.
        Specified by:
        drawItem in interface org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.CategoryItemRenderer
        Parameters:
        gd - the graphics device.
        cirs - state information for one chart.
        rd - the data plot area.
        cp - the plot.
        ca - the domain axis.
        va - the range axis.
        cd - the Marker data.
        i - the row index (zero-based).
        i1 - the column index (zero-based).
        i2 - the pass index.
        Since:
        0.10
        See Also:
        CategoryPlot.draw(java.awt.Graphics2D, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D, java.awt.geom.Point2D, org.jfree.chart.plot.PlotState, org.jfree.chart.plot.PlotRenderingInfo)

      • drawRMarker

        private java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D drawRMarker(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                                              org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot plot,
                                              org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis axis,
                                              org.jfree.chart.plot.Marker marker,
                                              java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D dataArea)
        Method to draw the Marker and estimate the high precision bound box. Ripped and modified from AbstractCategoryItemRenderer.drawRangeMarker(java.awt.Graphics2D, org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot, org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis, org.jfree.chart.plot.Marker, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D)
        Parameters:
        g2 - the graphics device (not null).
        plot - the plot (not null).
        axis - the range axis (not null).
        marker - the marker to be drawn (not null).
        dataArea - the area inside the axes (not null).
        Returns:
        Rectangle2D The bounding Shape
        Since:
        0.10
